bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Teritory of Washington County of Jefferson } ss
To the sheriff of said County

There was ____ against A. N. Jones for the sm of $29.90 one for 19.05 __ of said was recorded on the 29th day of July 1867 before the ___ one of the Jstice of th peace in and for ___ county at the suit of 76. L Ibbas and an execution against his penalty returned unsatisfied and an affidavit has been filed that said A. N. Jones in about __ leave the Territory , these _therefore, in the name of the United States _I command you to take the body of the said A.N. Jones, and hereby convery and deliver tot he keeper of the jail of said county, who is berby commanded to recive and keep the said A. N. Jones in a safe custofy in prison, until the aforsaid ___ and all legal ___- be paid and setisfied unitl he be discharged therefo by one ___ of law and
and of this wil make due retune
Given ___ my ___- this 21st ay of April 1869
Hereby sertify that the writting is a true and correct copy of the one final ____ by which no within name A.N. Jones is held in my custody
